original_text: So the man who came down is also the man who went up, high above all the heavens. He did that so that he would fill everything everywhere.
korean_text: 내리셨던 그가 곧 모든 하늘 위에 오르신 자니 이는 만물을 충만하게 하려 하심이라

sentences.original_text: So the man who came down
is also the man who went up
so that he would fill everything everywhere
sentences.korean_translation: 그가 모든 곳의 모든 것을 채우기 위해
